summary: Busy day at work with a new task assignment. Skipped morning run. Felt high positive energy and reduced social anxiety. Realized that stress and anxiety levels are closely tied to office workload. Emphasized mood safety as a priority.

wins: High energy and positive mood during work.
ideas: Protect mood by managing exposure to office stress.
Make mood safety a primary metric over other secondary routines.

goals: Observe how work-related stress shifts mood daily.
triggerEvents: Shifted from refactoring to new task at office.
